text: (screaming)
Okay Glossaryck. That's enough!

Stupid magic eye ball. Stupid
magic Glossaryck dimension.
Well that hurts my feelings. You barge into my eyeball unannounced

and then insult my home. If I knew you
were coming I would have tided up a bit.
Yep yep it's official. I hate magic.
I'm...I'm gonna destroy it
What? And how are you going to do that?

I could...I could say the whispering spell
inside the realm of magic. Boom. It's the only way to stop Mina.

Okay whoa calm down.
Look see it's all gone. It's all gone.
Oh so now you're just gonna put me in the grandma room? Why did he put me in the grandma room? Glossaryck?

Glossaryck, please don't leave me here with my
dysfunctional family. Huh okay. Hi Eclipsa.
Mother. Hi Celena wait where's Celena?
It's a grandma reunion. Hello hi what are we all looking at? My tapestry. It's finished.
Oh my. I actually destroyed the magic so my

temper tantrum was right all along and
they're gone.

Monster castle is looking good. No Mina
and everyone is safe and happy okay

great obviously gonna go destroy the
magic now.
Wait where's Marco?
So no magic means no Marco? actually no
Actually no magic means no Glossayrck. Marco will be fine. The magic will put him back where he belongs.
On Earth...
But that's not fair! Plus that doesn't even make sense.The magic put Marco in the lint catcher

at the Mewni castle and it put me in a
shed with Doop Doop and my mom on Pie Island.

Oh I'm sure it had a really good
reason to do that.Well your mom makes really good pies.

Hey! Excuse me. Excuse me. You need to change this.
My boyfriend Marco...he is missing in this

picture. Can you please just add him in
there like maybe holding my hand or just errr
Star...
It's just he...he belongs with me.
Star!
What!
I think the tapestry is done.

So I have to destroy the magic. I guess
this means Toffee was right.
Surprise!

Star! Geez we were kind of getting
worried about you. Did you uh you figure anything out in there?

I'm gonna destroy the
magic.
